      • transportCompress

        protected boolean transportCompress()

      • newResponse

        protected NodesResponse newResponse(NodesRequest request,
                                    java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReferenceArray nodesResponses)
        Map the responses into nodeResponseClass responses and FailedNodeExceptions.
        参数:
        request - The associated request.
        nodesResponses - All node-level responses
        返回:
        Never null.
        抛出:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if nodesResponses is null
        另请参阅:
        newResponse(BaseNodesRequest, List, List)

      • newResponse

        protected abstract NodesResponse newResponse(NodesRequest request,
                                             java.util.List<NodeResponse> responses,
                                             java.util.List<FailedNodeException> failures)
        Create a new NodesResponse (multi-node response).
        参数:
        request - The associated request.
        responses - All successful node-level responses.
        failures - All node-level failures.
        返回:
        Never null.
        抛出:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameter is null.
